ISSUE.TITLE: e2e: rethink setenforce-0
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Found by accident while reviewing #18544: https://github.com/containers/podman/blob/493aac69e06605a26307bb3d774670c0b1fb5e3b/test/e2e/login_logout_test.go#L45-L50 https://github.com/containers/podman/blob/493aac69e06605a26307bb3d774670c0b1fb5e3b/test/e2e/push_test.go#L248-L252 Let's understand if/why these are needed. * If not needed: remove * If needed: explain in comments, and Serialize.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #18604 from edsantiago/fix_htmlspan [CI:DOCS] fix HTMLSpan warnings

COMMIT.MESSAGE: test/e2e: do not call setenforce We should not change selinux, in a parallel context this can change the behavior of other tests and we should never disable selinux anyway. Lets see if this passes CI or not. Fixes #18564 Signed-off-by: Paul Holzinger <pholzing@redhat.com>
